title: How to "DYOR" for crypto stable coins | 3 Steps Economics Analysis | DeFi Markets
description:
If you're Doing Your Own Research (DYOR) on stable crypto coins, this episode explains how to use quantitative and qualitative metrics to analyze them, the 3 types of risks to look at, and how Lisa & our research team applied these concepts to compare 8 different stablecoins in our research report of Apr/May 2021.

The report can be downloaded for free over at econteric.com :)

p.s. Thanks to Fernando for assisting with the audio processing for the episode!
dc:creator: Lisa JY Tan
